Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、どうしてサニイタウンは、 古代地図には描かれてなかったんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, how come Sunnytown wasn't on the ancient map?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何言ってんの、<Tytree>？ 当然でしょ、 昔はなかったから、描かれてないんだヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: What are you talking about, <Tytree>? They didn't put it on there because it obviously didn't exist back then!

Entry.JapaneseText: あのなあ……だから、なんで昔は なかったんだって、聞いてんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well... You see here... I wanted to know <Italic>why</Italic> it didn't exist back then!

Entry.JapaneseText: 海賊の日誌にもあった「泳ぎ去った島」というのが サニイタウンならば、説明はつく。
Entry.EnglishText: The Captain's logs mentioned an island that "swam away." If Sunnytown was that island, then that would explain it.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよー！ 何の疑問も解決できてねーよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: What the heck? I'm not getting any answers here!
